--- title: "R Workshop" --- ::: callout-important Make sure that you have read the [Code of Conduct](/code-of-conduct.qmd). The [FAQ](/faq.qmd) will answer many common questions, including pre-requisites. Importantly, you will need to be familiar with R and RStudio to get the most out of this workshop. ::: ::: callout-tip ### Workshop information {.unnumbered} The AgReFed Data-Harvester Workshop **in R** will be run on **Tue, 25 Oct, 2022** from **9:30 AM - 12:30 PM** (AEST). ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(countdown) countdown(minutes = 0, seconds = 15) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
00:15
``` ::: ::: The R workshop will introduce you to the `dataharvester` package and is aimed at people who are already familiar with R and RStudio. You can choose to use either RStudio Desktop or [RStudio Cloud](https://rstudio.cloud/) to run the code examples. ## Join us - {{< fa chalkboard-user >}} **Zoom link**: [Register online](https://www.eventbrite.com.au/e/agrefed-data-harvester-workshop-tickets-425515517367r) and link to the workshop will be sent, via email, closer to the workshop date. - {{< fa download >}} **Workshop material**: Click [here]() to download the workshop material. (*Link will be available closer to the workshop date.*)
